description: When attempting to concatenate a string and a dictionary, a compile/runtime error is thrown, stating "unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'str' and 'dict'".
code:
# Program that throws an error when attempting to concatenate a string and a dictionary

# Create a string
string = "Hello World!"

# Create a dictionary
dictionary = {
  "name": "John Doe",
  "age": 25
}
